    User Guide

    Creates a Count instance from a given Cub object

    rscu-Cub-method.Rd

    Creates a Count instance from a given Cub object

    Usage

    # S4 method for Cub
rscu(object)

    Arguments

    object

    A Cub instance to summarize

    Value

    RSCU representing Relative Synonymous Codon Usage for a given Gene / Genome

    Examples

    dat <- Cub('A DNA', PA14CDS[[1]])
rscu(dat)
#> An object of class "Counts"
